articles.description: Listen to Sportsound or BBC Radio 5 Live commentary from Ibrox and follow text updates as Scottish Premiership leaders Celtic visit Rangers.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Rangers host Celtic in Old Firm derby

articles.description: Max Verstappen cruises to a comfortable victory in the Japanese Grand Prix, leading team-mate Sergio Perez to a Red Bull one-two.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix 2024 result: Max Verstappen wins after crash delay

articles.description: Captain Sophie Devine makes an unbeaten century to help New Zealand to a seven-wicket win over England in their third and final one-day international.
articles.title: Devine leads NZ to consolation ODI win over England

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his players will be "angry" when they face Liverpool and has called on them to "bring big games over the line".
articles.title: Man Utd will be 'angry' against Liverpool - Ten Hag

articles.description: Frankie Dettori rides six consecutive winners, at cumulative odds of more than 77,000-1, at Santa Anita in California on Saturday evening.
articles.title: Frankie Dettori wins six consecutive races at Santa Anita

articles.description: Nikola Jokic posts his 25th triple-double of the season to help the Denver Nuggets beat the Atlanta Hawks 142-110 and move top of the Western Conference.
articles.title: NBA: Nikola Jokic triple-double helps Denver Nuggets beat Atlanta Hawks

articles.description: Lionel Messi scores for Inter Miami in a 2-2 draw with Colorado Rapids as he makes his return from injury.
articles.title: Messi scores for Inter Miami on return from injury

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from day three of the opening round of the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship day three - radio & text

articles.description: Lindsey Horan converts a 77th-minute penalty to give the United States a 2-1 win over Japan and send them into the final of the SheBelieves Cup.
articles.title: Horan penalty sends USA into SheBelieves Cup final

articles.description: Arsenal maintained their pursuit of a first Premier League title for 20 years as they moved top of the table with an impressive away victory over Brighton.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Brighton to move top of Premier League
